actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    a.id AS assignment_id, 
    t.title, 
    t.description, 
    t.task_status, 
    a.assigneddate
FROM public.assignment a
JOIN public.task t ON t.id = a.task_id
JOIN public.volunteerprofiles vp ON vp.id = a.volunteer_profile_id
WHERE vp.user_id = '{{appsmith.store.user_profile.id}}';

SELECT 
    a.id AS assignment_id, 
    t.title, 
    t.description, 
    t.task_status, 
    a.assigneddate
FROM public.assignment a
JOIN public.task t ON t.id = a.task_id
JOIN public.volunteerprofiles vp ON vp.id = a.volunteer_profile_id
WHERE vp.user_id = '{{appsmith.store.user_profile.id}}';

SELECT * 
FROM public.donation
INNER JOIN public.address
ON public.donation.address_id = public.address.address_id
WHERE public.donation.role = 'GIVER';

SELECT * 
FROM public.donation
INNER JOIN public.address
ON public.donation.address_id = public.address.address_id
WHERE public.donation.role = 'GIVER';

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT * 
FROM public.donation
INNER JOIN public.address
ON public.donation.address_id = public.address.address_id
WHERE public.donation.role = 'RECEIVER';

SELECT * 
FROM public.donation
INNER JOIN public.address
ON public.donation.address_id = public.address.address_id
WHERE public.donation.role = 'RECEIVER';
